hero.title: I Build Your Ideas
hero.subtitle: Scalable, intelligent technical solutions for your business

process.title: From Idea to Reality
process.subtitle: Do you have an idea you want to see grow? I help you make it a reality.

steps.title: Your Idea
steps.description: Everything starts with your vision. We discuss your goals, needs, and desires to shape the idea.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: I transform the idea into code using modern technology that provides scalability and performance.

steps.title: Result
steps.description: A finished solution that turns your idea into reality, focusing on user-friendliness and quality.

services.title: My Specialties
services.subtitle: With a background in modern web development, AI integration, and automation, I help you transform your ideas into scalable, intelligent solutions. My focus is on combining technical innovation with practical usability.

items.title: Web Applications
items.description: Modern web applications built with React and Next.js

items.title: Backend Systems
items.description: Robust backend solutions with Node.js and databases

items.title: Responsive Design
items.description: User-friendly interfaces that work on all devices

services.question: Do you have an idea or a problem that needs a technical solution?

projects.title: My Projects

testimonials.title: What Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Read what my clients and collaborators have to say about my projects.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Do you have a project in mind or want to know more about my services? Send a message and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
